    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(java.lang.String token,
                            java.lang.String clientId,
                            int shardTotal)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Generate shards to run the Discord bot. Bots are limited to 2500 servers per shard.
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the Discord bot.
        clientId - the client identifier of the Discord bot.
        shardTotal - the maximum shards to generate.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted.

      • getShards

        public static Shard[] getShards()

        Returns:
        list of shards.

        Returns:
        the shard

      • restart

        public static void restart(java.lang.String token,
                           java.lang.String clientId,
                           int shardId)
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Restart a specify shard.
        Parameters:
        token - The token of the bot
        clientId - The client identifier of the bot
        shardId - The shard identifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted

        public static int getRecommendedShards(java.lang.String token)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        recommended shard count
